section.heading: Limitation on successive applications after denial.

para.text: A second and each subsequent application for any class of license for the same location and submitted by the same applicant shall not be considered within 5 years of a denial.

If an application is withdrawn for good cause, as determined by the Board, before the roll call hearing, or if the first application was denied for purely technical or procedural reasons, as determined by the Board, another application by the same applicant for a license of the same class at the same location, the restriction set forth in subsection (a) of this section shall not apply.
